presentbox/presentbox_012:
The period to claim some items has
passed. Failed to claim.
presentbox/presentbox_013:
Previously earned medals have been
automatically converted to ★ power-ups.
presentbox/receivable_empty_text: There are no presents to claim.
presentbox/received_empty_text: No presents claimed in the last [Digit:3digits ] days.
presentbox/help:
• Claimed presents will be displayed
for [Digit:3digits ] days.

• Expired presents will be removed
automatically.

• You can claim a maximum of [Digit:3digits ]
presents at once.
presentbox/help_02:
• Expired presents will be deleted
automatically.
• You can claim a maximum of [Digit:3digits Idx="1" ]
presents at once.
• Claimed presents will be displayed
for [Digit:3digits Idx="2" ] days. Up to [Digit:4digits Idx="3" ] pieces of
gear can be displayed at a time.
• The Temp Storage tab can hold up
to [Digit:4digits Idx="4" ] pieces of gear. If this limit is
exceeded, gear will be deleted,
starting with the oldest items.
presentbox/receive_failed_description: You’ve exceeded the limit of how much you can hold, so you were unable to claim some items.
presentbox/receive_failed_description_00: You’ve hit your item limit, so some weren’t claimed.
